Module.Name: Consumer product exposures
Module.Description: Consumer product exposures are the amounts of substances, expressed per kg bodyweight, to which individuals in a population are exposed from average consumer product usage per individual. Consumer product exposures are long-term/chronic exposures, they represent the average exposure per day over an unspecified longer time period.
Module.ShortDescription: Consumer product exposures are the amounts of substances, expressed per kg bodyweight, to which individuals in a population are exposed from average consumer product usage per individual.
Module.CalculationDescription: Consumer product exposures are calculated from consumer product concentration, use frequencies and amount models.
